title: You will love this Studio. A Higher Quality of Living!
posting_body: ['The Covington Apartments', 'Visit our community today!', '5800 American Blvd W Bloomington, MN 55437', 'show contact info', 'Unit Rates:', '$1475 - $1505/month', 'Unit Type:', 'Studio-BR 1-BA', 'Unit Size:', '536 sq ft', 'Lease Terms:', '3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month, 15-Month, 16-Month', 'Pet Policy:', 'Pet Friendly - Max 2 allowed, One time Fee $300.00, Rent $40.00, Deposit $200.00, Breed Restrictions Apply.', 'What you’ll find in our community:', '➢ Business Center', '➢ Cardio Machines', '➢ Conference Room', '➢ Courtyard', '➢ Elevator', '➢ Fire Pits', '➢ Free Weights', '➢ Online Payments', '➢ Pool', '➢ Recycling', '➢ Barbecue/Grill Area', '➢ Corporate Suites', '➢ Dry Cleaning Service', '➢ Furnished Units Available', '➢ Kingsley Excellence Award', '➢ Massages Offered', '➢ Package Deliver to Apartment', '➢ Planned Social Activities', '➢ Reservable Clubhouse', '➢ Video Surveillance/Patrol', 'Description:', 'The Covington is in a great location near popular attractions and with easy access to I-494, Hwy 5 & public transportation.', "We're just 13 miles south of Minneapolis and 22 miles southwest of St. Paul.", "Take a ten-minute stroll and you'll be at the Normandale Lake Bandshell, which holds fun outdoor concerts and events.", "If you're more into cultural activities, check out the nearby Bloomington Center for the Arts where you'll find theaters, art galleries, art classrooms and more.", 'Like the water?', 'Bush Lake Beach is the perfect spot for canoeing, swimming, exploring trails or just laying out on the sand.', 'This unit comes with:', '➢ Air Conditioning', '➢ Floor to Ceiling Windows', '➢ Garbage Disposal', '➢ Granite Islands In Kitchen', '➢ Maple Cabinetry', '➢ Microwave', '➢ Nature and City Views', '➢ Plank Flooring', '➢ Smoke Free', '➢ Sprinkler System', 'Call or visit our website to schedule a personal tour!', 'Office Phone:', 'show contact info', 'Mon - Thu: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Fri - Sat: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Property Management:', 'Weidner Apartment Homes, LLC', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'A56CC6D3E8D240']
